name: Golden Ocean Seafood Restaurant
address: 2046 41st Ave W, Vancouver BC V6M 1Y8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp and Garlic Spring Rolls / 蒜蓉蝦春捲
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy spring rolls filled with succulent shrimp and aromatic garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Mini Sticky Rice Lotus Wrap / 珍珠糯米雞
hasMenuItem.description: Glutinous rice filled with savory ingredients, wrapped in lotus leaves.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed BBQ Pork Bun / 蠔皇叉燒飽
hasMenuItem.description: Soft, fluffy buns filled with sweet and savory barbecued pork.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Shrimp Dumpling / 鮮蝦餃
hasMenuItem.description: Delicate steamed dumplings filled with succulent shrimp, wrapped in a translucent rice flour skin.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Pork Dumplings / 魚子燒賣
hasMenuItem.description: Delicate steamed pork dumplings topped with vibrant orange fish roe, encased in a thin, tender wrapper.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Shrimp and Chives Dumplings / 鮮蝦韭菜餃
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed dumplings filled with fresh shrimp and chopped chives, wrapped in a delicate translucent skin.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Shrimp Bean Curd Rolls / 鮮蝦腐皮卷
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried shrimp bean curd rolls typically include shrimp wrapped in bean curd skin and deep-fried until golden brown.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Shrimp and Pea Tips Dumplings / 鮮蝦豆苗餃
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed dumplings filled with shrimp and pea tips, wrapped in delicate wheat starch skin.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Boneless Duck, Stuffed with Taro / 荔芋香酥鴨
hasMenuItem.description: Fried boneless duck typically includes taro stuffing, offering a harmonious blend of textures and flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Yang Chow Fried Rice / 楊州炒飯
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried rice with shrimp, BBQ pork, egg, peas, carrots, and scallions.

hasMenuItem.name: Shredded Chicken Chow Mein / 雞絲炒麵
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried noodles with shredded chicken, bean sprouts, onions, scallions, and carrots.

hasMenuItem.name: Rice Vermicelli Singapore Style / 星洲炒米
hasMenuItem.description: Wok-fried rice vermicelli noodles with BBQ pork, shrimp, assorted vegetables, and a touch of curry seasoning.

hasMenuSection.name: Dimsum Menu - Dim Sum (M) / 中點

hasMenuItem.name: Bean Curd Rolls with Oyster Sauce / 蠔汁鮮竹卷
hasMenuItem.description: Rolled bean curd typically filled with pork, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, and carrots, served with a savory oyster sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Turnip Cake / 煎蘿蔔糕
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried turnip cake typically includes shredded turnip, dried shrimp, and Chinese sausage, mixed with rice flour and lightly fried until crispy.

hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried taro cake, typically includes bits of dried shrimp and Chinese bacon, offering a savory flavor and unique texture.

hasMenuItem.description: Made with brown sugar, milk, egg, and flour.

hasMenuItem.description: Steamed buns typically filled with seasoned chicken.

hasMenuItem.description: Savory Chinese sausage typically wrapped in a soft dough and steamed.

hasMenuItem.name: Chilled Mango Pudding / 香芒凍布甸
hasMenuItem.description: A pudding made from mango puree and milk, typically infused with agar agar, and served chilled.

hasMenuItem.name: Water Chestnut Pudding / 桂林馬蹄糕
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet jelly pudding made with shredded Chinese water chestnut, offering a delicate texture and subtle sweetness.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Duck Feet / 柱候鴨掌
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed duck feet typically marinated and cooked in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Chinese Donut / 油條
hasMenuItem.description: Golden-brown deep-fried strip of dough, commonly enjoyed for its light, airy texture.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed BBQ Pork Bun / 蠔皇叉燒飽
hasMenuItem.description: Soft, fluffy buns filled with sweet and savory barbecued pork.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked BBQ Pork Pastry / 蜜汁叉燒酥
hasMenuItem.description: Flaky pastry filled with sweet and savory BBQ pork, topped with sesame seeds.

hasMenuSection.name: Dimsum Menu - Dim Sum (S) / 小點

hasMenuItem.name: Chilled Coconut Milk Gelatin / 鮮奶椰汁糕
hasMenuItem.description: Coconut milk and gelatin are combined and chilled into a smooth, subtly sweet gelatin dessert with a delicate coconut aroma.

hasMenuItem.name: Chilled Wolf Berry W/cinnamon Gelatin / 杞子桂花糕
hasMenuItem.description: A refreshing gelatin dessert infused with goji berries and a hint of cinnamon.

hasMenuSection.name: Dimsum Menu - Dim Sum (SP) / 特點

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Offals / 牛雜
hasMenuItem.description: Beef offals, typically including tripe, braised in a fragrant mixture of black pepper, star anise, and other spices until tender.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Squid / 炸鮮魷
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy, deep-fried squid typically includes a light batter and may be seasoned with salt and pepper.

hasMenuItem.name: Braised Beef Stomach with Pumpkin / 南瓜牛肚
hasMenuItem.description: Beef stomach is braised with pumpkin in a fragrant broth, typically seasoned with spices like star anise and black pepper until tender.

hasMenuItem.name: Baby Cuttlefish in Curry Sauce / 咖哩墨魚仔
hasMenuItem.description: Baby cuttlefish in curry sauce typically includes tender cuttlefish simmered in a fragrant Chinese-style curry sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Beef Tendon / 柱候牛筋
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed beef tendon typically includes a house special brown sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Rib in Black Pepper Sauce / 黑椒牛仔骨
hasMenuItem.description: Beef short ribs stir-fried in a savory black pepper sauce, a classic dim sum delicacy.

hasMenuSection.name: Dimsum Menu - Dim Sum (K) / 廚點

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Rice with Chicken and Mushroom / 北菇雞飯 小
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed rice with chicken and mushrooms typically includes tender chicken and shiitake mushrooms, steamed together with fragrant rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Rice with Taro and Preserved Meats / 香芋臘味飯 小
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed rice typically includes chunks of taro and preserved meats like Chinese sausage.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Assorted Vegetables / 清炒雜菜 小
hasMenuItem.description: A medley of vegetables, typically including bok choy, mushrooms, and carrots, stir-fried to enhance their natural flavors.

hasMenuItem.description: Crisp green beans stir-fried with minced pork, dried chili peppers, and garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Supreme Soy Sauce Rice Rolls / 豉油皇煎腸粉 小
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried rice noodle rolls typically include supreme soy sauce for a savory flavor.

hasMenuItem.description: Fried chicken knee with spicy salt typically includes salt and pepper seasoning, offering a crispy and flavorful dim sum experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Diced Beef with Eggplant in Special Sauce / 醬爆茄子牛肉粒 小
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried diced beef and eggplant, typically includes a special sauce, offering a savory and satisfying dim sum experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Supreme Dumpling in Soup / 魚翅竹笙灌湯餃
hasMenuItem.description: Dumplings typically filled with imitation shark fin and bamboo fungus, served in a rich broth.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Rice with Beef and Egg / 窩蛋牛肉飯 小
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed rice topped with minced beef and a soft-cooked egg.

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Hock and Ginger in Sweet Vinegar / 八珍甜醋豬腳薑

hasMenuItem.name: Stir-Fried Clams in Black Bean Sauce / 豉椒炒蜆 小
hasMenuItem.description: Clams stir-fried with black bean sauce, typically featuring bell peppers, onions, and garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Tofu in Spicy Salt / 椒鹽豆腐 小
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried tofu typically seasoned with spicy salt and pepper.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Plain Buns ( 6 Pcs) / 軟骨花卷 (六件)

hasMenuItem.name: Braised Mushrooms and Bean Curd Skin / 三菇扒素皮 小
hasMenuItem.description: Braised mushrooms and bean curd skin typically include a mix of shiitake, wood ear, and enoki mushrooms, simmered together with tender bean curd skin.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Radish Cake with XO Sauce / XO醬炒蘿蔔糕
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried radish cake with Chinese sausage and dried shrimp, sautéed in XO sauce, a slightly spicy seafood-based condiment.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Noodles in Supreme Soy Sauce / 豉油皇炒麵 小
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried egg noodles with supreme soy sauce, typically including bean sprouts, green peppers, onions, and carrots.

hasMenuItem.name: Mu Shu Pork / 木須豬肉
hasMenuItem.description: Shredded pork, cabbage, mushrooms, and eggs sautéed in house sauce, wrapped in thin Mandarin pancakes with hoisin sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Dried Garlic Spareribs / 蒜子乾骨
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried pork spareribs typically seasoned with garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Mu Shu Beef / 木須牛肉
hasMenuItem.description: Shredded beef sautéed with Chinese vegetables and eggs, served wrapped in 4 thin mandarin pancakes with hoisin sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried, Stuffed Crab Meat (1 Pc) / 炸蚧鉗
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried, stuffed crab meat typically includes a crab claw filled with shrimp paste, encased in a crispy batter.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Spring Roll (Each) / 春卷（條）
hasMenuItem.description: Shredded vegetables wrapped in rice paper and deep-fried until crispy. One piece per order.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef and Egg Drop Soup / 西湖牛肉羹

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken and Cream Corn Soup / 雞茸粟米羹
hasMenuItem.description: Minced chicken and sweet corn in a creamy broth, featuring delicate egg flower for added richness.

hasMenuItem.name: Crab Meat and Fish Maw Soup / 蟹肉魚肚羹
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh crab meat, fish maw, and egg white in a thick chicken broth.

hasMenuItem.name: Mushroom Egg Swirl Soup / 蘑菇蛋花湯
hasMenuItem.description: Features mushrooms and delicate egg ribbons in a savory broth.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot and Sour Soup / 酸辣湯
hasMenuItem.description: Szechuan style.

hasMenuItem.name: BBQ Pork Wonton Soup / 叉燒雲吞湯
hasMenuItem.description: Barbecued pork and wontons in a savory broth, typically garnished with green onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Quick Fried Prawns / 油泡明蝦球
hasMenuItem.description: Quick-fried prawns, typically with a light coating, offering a tender and slightly crispy texture.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Prawns with Sweet and Sour Sauce / 甜酸大明蝦
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried prawns typically served with bell peppers, onions, carrots, and pineapple in a sweet and sour sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Squids with Seasonal Vegetable / 時菜鮮魷
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried squid with a variety of seasonal vegetables, typically including bok choy, broccoli, carrots, and onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Sole Fillet / 椒鹽骨香龍利球魚
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried sole fillet, typically seasoned with salt, pepper, and other spices for a crispy, golden finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Prawns and Green Bean with Sambal Sauce / 三巴蝦豆仔
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried prawns and green beans in a spicy sambal sauce, typically featuring dried shrimp and chili paste.

hasMenuItem.name: Stir-Fried Halibut and Vegetables with Soya Sauce / 碧綠頭抽哈利拔
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried halibut with broccoli, snow peas, bell peppers, and mushrooms in a savory soya sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Black Cod with Spiced Salt / 椒鹽黑魚
hasMenuItem.description: Deep fried black cod typically seasoned with spiced salt, green onions, and jalapeños.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Scallops / 油泡带子
hasMenuItem.description: Lightly seared scallops typically paired with vegetables such as bell peppers and onions, creating a delicate and savory dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Szechuan Shrimp (Hot) / 四川蝦仁
hasMenuItem.description: Hot and spicy.

hasMenuItem.name: Special Curry with Prawns / 咖哩蝦球
hasMenuItem.description: Prawns sautéed with bell peppers, onions, and celery in a mildly spiced curry sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Prawns with Honey Salad Dressing / 沙汁明蝦球
hasMenuItem.description: Lightly fried prawns typically dressed in a sweet honey-based sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Platter of Spiced Shrimp / 椒鹽焗中蝦
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried shrimp with shell, seasoned with salt, pepper, and Chinese spices. Typically includes onions, garlic, and diced peppers. Spicy.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Shrimp with Cashew Nut / 腰果蝦仁
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried shrimp with cashew nuts, typically includes celery, carrots, and mushrooms, sautéed in a savory brown sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Squid with Spicy Salt / 椒鹽鮮魷
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried squid typically tossed with spicy salt, minced garlic, and sliced pepper.

hasMenuItem.name: Sautéed Prawns with Seasonal Vegetable / 菜遠明蝦球

hasMenuItem.description: Half a chicken deep-fried until crispy, served with shrimp chips for added texture.
